attributes.action: make the 11th April a public hoilday celebrating the cultural icon, Baby Ben.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Baby Ben (Ben Weatherley) is a cultural icon and local public figure, well known to the residents of Clerkenwell. We urge the government to make this day a public holiday so that we can celebrate his uniqueness and boost the morale of local residents.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
